content: Excellent, I've been looking forward to replaceAll.
Awesome. replaceAll will make everything WAY easier.
Agreed. Depth gives you a way to create your niche. Breadth seems like trying to please everyone, which never works.
No way. Breadth keeps you from getting bored, man.
Aww, now I'm all nostalgic for high school.
Oh god, I have a headache just thinking about it.
You forgot the autoplaying, oversynthesized 'music.' Ewwwww.
The animations ... my eyes! My eyes!
And those '90s neons. I'm gonna have to incorporate that into my next project
